position: Relationship Manager | Invest in Luxury | Wealth Preservation

experience.title: Relationship Manager
experience.description: As an expert in luxury living, wealth preservation, and golden visas, I specialize in providing comprehensive support tailored to your needs. With years of experience, I excel in sourcing second homes for the affluent across various geographic regions. Whether you're seeking opulent lifestyles, safeguarding your assets, or exploring golden visa opportunities, I am here to guide you every step of the way.Elevate your lifestyle and secure your financial future with personalized solutions crafted just for you. Reach out to me today, and let's embark on this journey together towards a world of luxury, security, and opportunity.

projects: [{"title":"Tierra Viva","start_date":"Feb 2024","description":"When an iconic territory and an icon of power come together, the supernatural happens. Tierra Viva is the first residential project by Lamborghini and DarGlobal in the South of Spain. An exclusive gated community of only 53 exclusive luxury villas with design inspired by Automobili Lamborghini. Located in the hills of Benahavis, overlooking Marbella, Tierra Viva rises out from the hills, with endless panoramic views of the Mediterranean Sea and the Andalusian landscape.At the heart of Tierra Viva's allure are The Painite Villas, a showcase of advanced car elevator technology that echoes Lamborghini's innovative spirit. These villas are specifically designed for those who cherish their automotive passions, providing a seamless blend of luxury living and automotive excellence. Owners of The Painite Villas can enjoy the luxury of having their beloved vehicles elevated directly into their living spaces, a feature that redefines the concept of a garage and merges it with the aesthetic of high-end living."},{"title":"Small Oasis - Manilva Costa Del Sol Spain","start_date":"Aug 2018","end_date":"Sep 2023","description":"501 Units for sale in Costa Del Sol Spain"},{"title":"Inaugurado el vial estructurante y dep√≥sito de agua de la zona de Martagina","start_date":"Feb 2022","end_date":"Feb 2022","description":"Ayer se inaugur√≥ el vial-dep√≥sito de Martagina y se llev√≥ a cabo la recepci√≥n del evento y presentaci√≥n del Big Life en Small Oasis.
